Projects

Neural Networks

Breast Cancer Classification

A neural network trained on the Wisconsin Breast Cancer Data Set. It can classify breast cancer cells as benign or malignant based on 10 pieces of data regarding its size, shape and other variables. The network has around a 91% accuracy on a randomized testing set.

Click here for a more in depth explanation.
